# zitadel_organization_domains (Data Source)

Datasource representing domains of an organization in ZITADEL.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `organization_id` (String) ID of the organization

### Optional

- `domain` (String) Filter domains by name

### Read-Only

- `domains` (List of Object) List of organization domains (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--domains))
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedatt--domains"></a>
### Nested Schema for `domains`

Read-Only:

- `domain` (String)
- `is_primary` (Boolean)
- `is_verified` (Boolean)
